Honeywell partners with Mark Wahlberg
Wahlberg and his flight operations team partnered with Honeywell to upgrade the flight deck, satellite communications system, services and software solutions on his Bombardier Global Express business jet. The upgrade helps deliver a better flying experience for Mark and his passengers while also enhancing the aircraft’s value.
READ MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/customer-success-stories/2021/03/honeywell-creates-great-flying-experience-for-mark-wahlberg?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_bganewsletter&utm_content=marbganewsletter]]> Honeywell's LASEREF series continues innovative tradition
Honeywell’s LASEREF family has been the standard for commercial aviation since 1997. We invite customers of our products and services to subscribe to AIN and receive the 2021 survey by following the quick 2 minute registration process using this link: www.ainonline.com/pss/honeywell <[[http://www.ainonline.com/pss/honeywell]]>. If you’re already subscribed to AIN and take the annual survey, then we simply encourage you to watch for and complete the 2021 survey.
